title: Dear Louis, any chance of changing the settings on the image uploader...
message: ...so it doesn't dumb down the pictures so much? It would be nice to be able to retain the detail on these pics I'm uploading. They're rendered pretty useless as it is right now. The example pic I uploaded is a 4032 x 3024 pixel image that looks absolutely perfect on my screen, even when zoomed in. After uploading it, it's a 440 x 330 image. Unfortunately, not very useable.
